The number of integers is \( 3183 - 319 + 1 = 2865 \).

The function y = sin(1/x) has x-intercepts at x = 1/(nπ) for each integer n. To find how many such x-values lie in the interval (0.0001, 0.001), we solve for n:

0.0001 < 1/(nπ) < 0.001  
⇒ 318.309 < n < 3183.098

Thus, n ranges from 319 to 3183, inclusive. The number of integers in this range is:

3183 - 319 + 1 = 2865
